name: Expert Tax Stockholm 2026 - High Income (30% exemption)
description: Foreign specialist earning SEK 900,000 in Stockholm with 2026 Expert Tax (30% exemption)

sources.description: Based on 2026 Expert Tax rules: 30% exemption (up from 25% in 2025). Stockholm municipal tax 30.55%, grundavdrag SEK 17,400
sources.notes: Expert taxable: 900,000 × 70% = 630,000. Taxable after grundavdrag: 630,000 - 17,400 = 612,600. Municipal tax: 612,600 × 30.55% = 187,149. State tax: max(0, 612,600 - 643,000) × 20% = 0. Work credit: 0. Total tax: 187,149. Net: 712,851. Effective rate: 20.79%.
